timeline.bodyText:
I see no changes from line 154 until this line. please avoid reformating the whole file.
also please revert it and push only your changes.
timeline.author: ndrnour

timeline.bodyText: no usage for this function, could you provide some Info what's the purpose of it?
timeline.author: ndrnour

replies.bodyText:
depending which of these two functions you mean
getUnusedPointer provides a unused pointer in the range of 0-19 as there can only be 20 touch events simultaneously
getIdToEventThreadMap was there before so your guess might be better than mine
replies.author: Koell

replies.bodyText: getUnusedPointer() has no usage as far as I can see? did I miss something?
replies.author: ndrnour

replies.bodyText: TapAtAction line 47, kotlin removes the "get" from functions
replies.author: Koell

timeline.bodyText: for removing one object from an ArrayList, remove should be used instead of removeAll, right?
timeline.author: ndrnour

replies.bodyText: never mind, I got it, this removes all occurrences of the position from ArrayList
replies.author: ndrnour
